content: this legal text summarizes a case involving multiple parties a notary identified as mb has determined the costs and duration of the case the final resolution is that mr bp is awarded a 12 share of bare ownership of certain properties while the other 12 share is awarded to mr omissis as usufruct the properties are located in the municipality of castelfidardo and their details including cadastral surface areas are provided each share is valued at euro 630000 the text also mentions the registration and collection numbers of the case as well as the presence of the parties involved it concludes by stating that the existing coownership between mr bp and spouses cg and bm is terminated and the properties are divided into two shares one for each party the details of each share including the properties and their cadastral data are provided the value of the second share is also specified as euro 630000
